response.raw:
Here is a draft client-ready memo for that task:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Subject: Follow-up on Your Recent Claim

Dear [Customer Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out regarding the claim you filed with us on [date].

We have completed our investigation of your claim. Based on our findings, we have determined the following:

[Brief summary of investigation results and any planned adjustments]

If you have any questions about our findings or the next steps in the process, please don't hesitate to contact me. I'm happy to discuss this further or provide any additional information you may need.

Thank you for your patience during our investigation. We appreciate your business and look forward to continuing to serve you.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Senior Claims Representative
[Company Name]
Phone: [Your Phone Number]
Email: [Your Email]
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
